about_the_game:
Play as River as they have a trip over the weekend with their friends. Choose what River does during the trip. Will they hang out with your friends? Will they explore the cabin? Or will they choose to just let the trip pass as quickly as possible. These choices might affect your relationship with River's friends and might affect how the trip will be remembered.

Features:
- point-and-click gameplay
- choose how River talks to their friends
- choose how River reacts to their surroundings
- small puzzles
- hand drawn sprites and backgrounds
- atmospheric and ambient music

content_descriptors.notes:
Use of alcohol, Mild language
Characters may also discuss dealing with death, depression, bullying, and homophobia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 or higher
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA or AMD ATI video card with 2GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: A point-and-click about a trip with friends over the weekend. Help your friends, explore the place, or just enjoy the scenery. You decide what River does during this trip.
